author: cecilecaillol
body:
#### PR description:

Ported various track-based objects: track jets (both fast and two-layer), track MET, and track MHT/HT. 

Added the capability to run over the displaced tracks by adding an extra process (for example, TrackJetsExtended) to each producer, so prompt and displaced track jets can be run in the same config. User can also choose to only run a single producer with just, say, the prompt tracks. Doesn't require that both be run. Example config (includes running and ntuplizer): L1Trigger/TrackFindingTracklet/test/L1TrackObjectNtupleMaker_cfg.py

Merged the two-layer jets (L1Trigger/TwoLayerJets) into the L1TTrackMatch directory, and renamed them L1TrackJets, since they are the main track jets produced, and the ones used in the TDR. The fast track jet producer has been renamed L1TrackFastJets, which is useful for comparisons.

#### PR validation:

Rebase of https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/pull/857 and https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/pull/860

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Rebase of https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/pull/857 and https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/pull/860
title: L1T Phase-2: add various L1 Tk objects
